: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw started to look around as his escort was talking to the new bot and human that had appeared. He saw Perceptor and KitKat as they were coming down the ajoined hall.
SharpClaw's eyes locked onto KitKat. That sleak shiny black body, the glowing red eyes, this femme looked absolutely beautiful.
 "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...>" <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She followed Perceptor down the hall to meet her new leader.  She 
didn't feel quite right now doing this for some strange reason.  She 
just didn't feel herself.  She didn't want to be under anybot. But 
for some reason she felt very obligated to serve this bot whom she 
had not even seen, Hydrus.  She looked to Perceptor, "So, by the 
sounds of him, he's quite a warrior. I hope to prove myself worthy 
in battle."  She let her wolf tail swiswh behind her as she walked 
in bot mode down the hall.  She passed a door where the metal was 
quite shiney.  She glimsed her reflection and smiled. She still 
looked good after all these eons.  Her shiney black skin, her red 
optics still looked great.  She smiled to herself.  It takes a good 
looking bot to make a good first impression. She wasn't out to 
seduce him, she wanted him to think highly enough of her to make her 
a commander under him.
